taskbody.context:
Standard Designer Studio (DS) project models specific to Triple'A Plus components are available to be tailored to your specific needs. These standard models can be imported from the DS installation directory DS-HOME\ocs-binaries\ocs.extract.VERSION.NUMBER\repo\com\odcgroup\ocs\.
The following is a list of projects you can import and their location:
Project Name Location
cbi-models
.\cbi\cbi-models\VERSION
cdm-wui-models
.\cbi\cdm-wui-models\VERSION
mms-models
.\mms\mms-models\VERSION
nbox-models
.\nbox\nbox-models\VERSION
pms-models
.\cbi\pms-models\VERSION
wui-admin-models
.\wui\wui-admin-models\VERSION

step.cmd: On the menu bar, click File Import Projects... .
step.stepresult: The Import Projects dialog box is displayed.

step.cmd: Click the radio button for Select archive file.

Start browsing to the Design Studio installation directory specified above, which is typically located at C:\DS. There might be several ocs.extract.VERSION.NUMBER folders created each time a hotfix is installed. Choose the latest one.
Select the folder according to the project you want to import. For project names and location, refer to the table above.
step.stepresult: The Import dialog box is displayed with a list of DS project models.

step.cmd: Select the jar file PROJECT-VERSION-standard.jar that represents your standard project.
step.stepresult: The Import dialog box is displayed with a list of DS project models.
The selected model project is added to the DS Navigator view pane.
